parameter.name: deviceName
parameter.label: Device Name
parameter.description: The Name of a DigitalStrom device.

parameter.name: PowerConsumptionRefreshPriority
parameter.label: Power consumption refresh priority
parameter.description: Set the refresh priority for the power consumption sensor value. Can be never, low priority, medium priority or high priority.

parameter.name: ElectricMeterRefreshPriority
parameter.label: Electric meter refresh priority
parameter.description: Set the refresh priority for the Electric meter sensor value. Can be never, low priority, medium priority or high priority.

parameter.name: EnergyMeterRefreshPriority
parameter.label: Energy meter refresh priority
parameter.description: Set the refresh priority for the Energy meter sensor value. Can be never, low priority, medium priority or high priority.

parameter.name: dSUID
parameter.label: Device UID
parameter.description: The device identifier identifies one DigitalSTROM device.

parameter.name: dSID
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: The device identifier identifies one DigitalSTROM device.

parameter.name: meterDSID
parameter.label: Meter dSID
parameter.description: Identifier of the meter in which the device is connected.

parameter.name: hwInfo
parameter.label: Device hardware type
parameter.description: The hardware type from this DigitalSTROM device.

parameter.name: zoneID
parameter.label: Zone ID
parameter.description: The DigitalSTROM device is part of this zone.

parameter.name: groups
parameter.label: Group ID's
parameter.description: The DigitalSTROM device is part of this user-defined or functional groups.

parameter.name: outputmode
parameter.label: Device Output mode
parameter.description: The current DigitalSTROM device output mode e.g. 22 = dimmable.

parameter.name: funcColorGroup
parameter.label: Device functional color group
parameter.description: The current DigitalSTROM device functional color group e.g. yellow = light.
